exception_modalcontrol: The implementation used cannot create ModalControl controls

textHelp.help1: The modal extension opens a window within a viewer showing information relevant to the viewer itself.
textHelp.help2: The window content is customizable, so the content can change from one viewer to another. By default, information about the CNIG-API is displayed.
textHelp.help3: The information relevant to the extension and its possible parameterization is documented in
textHelp.help4: The example of use of its parameters can be checked in
